doc:
Robert Hegyes https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Hegyes 0 Robert Hegyes (pronounced Hedges; May 7, 1951 – January 26, 2012) was an American actor best known for his portrayal of high school student Juan Epstein on the 1970s American sitcom Welcome Back, Kotter and as detective Manny Esposito on the 1980s American crime drama Cagney Lacey. Robert_Hegyes ( pronounced_Hedges ; May_7_,_1951 – January_26_,_2012 ) was an_American_actor best_known for his_portrayal of high_school_student_Juan_Epstein on the_1970s_American_sitcom Welcome Back , Kotter and as detective_Manny_Esposito on the_1980s_American_crime_drama_Cagney_ .
